questions.q: What is the average distance of Mercury from the Sun?
How many Earth days does it take for Mercury to complete one orbit around the Sun?
Does Mercury have any natural satellites?
questions.a: No, it does not have any moons

questions.q: What is the surface temperature of Mercury?
What is the composition of Mercury's atmosphere?
What is the rotation direction of Venus?
questions.a: It rotates clockwise, or retrograde rotation

questions.q: What is the greenhouse effect on Venus?
questions.a: It has an extreme greenhouse effect, trapping heat

questions.q: How many Earth days does it take for Venus to complete one rotation on its axis?
What is the surface temperature of Venus?
Does Venus have any moons?
questions.a: No, it does not have any moons

questions.q: What is the diameter of Earth?

What is the Earth's average distance from the Sun?
What is the nickname for Mars due to its reddish appearance?
How many moons does Mars have?
questions.a: Mars has two small moons, Phobos and Deimos

questions.q: What is the average surface temperature of Mars?
What is the largest volcano on Mars?
What are the names of the Mars rovers?
What is the Great Red Spot on Jupiter?
questions.a: A giant storm that has been raging for at least 350 years

questions.q: How many moons does Jupiter have?
questions.a: Jupiter has at least 79 known moons

questions.q: What is the largest moon of Jupiter?
What is the main component of Jupiter's atmosphere?
What is the diameter of Jupiter?
What is the most prominent feature of Saturn?
How many rings does Saturn have?
questions.a: Saturn has seven main rings with many gaps and divisions

questions.q: What is the largest moon of Saturn?
What is the composition of Saturn's rings?
questions.a: Mostly composed of ice particles, with some rocky debris and dust

questions.q: What is the average density of Saturn?
questions.a: Saturn is less dense than water and would float in water

questions.q: How is Uranus different from other planets in the solar system?
questions.a: It rotates on its side, with an extreme tilt of about 98 degrees

questions.q: What is the color of Uranus?
questions.a: It has a blue-green color due to the presence of methane in its atmosphere

questions.q: How many moons does Uranus have?
What is the composition of Uranus's atmosphere?
questions.a: Primarily composed of hydrogen, helium, and methane

questions.q: What is the diameter of Uranus?
What is the most notable feature of Neptune?
questions.a: The Great Dark Spot, a massive storm system

questions.q: How many Earth years does Neptune take to orbit the Sun?

questions.a: Primarily composed of hydrogen, helium, and methane
